content:
while playing around with the DiagnosticOrder Ressource i wondered if something like differential updates were discussed in the FHIR community. If i have a DiagnosticOrder management system displaying all DiagnosticOrders with status requested and i just want to change the status of a Ressource it would be nice to be able to Update just one item of a ressource (described in FHIRpath). This could be a conditional or regular update.
Or is something like this already existing and i totaly missed this?
"PATCH" - see the last connectathon stream - will be added in STU3
